openOfferTarget.title: FREE <sup>$</sup>
openOfferTarget.offerCriteria: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in store OR online at Target.com
openOfferTarget.offerCriteriaOnline: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in online
openOfferTarget.offerCriteriaStore: Offer valid ONE-TIME ONLY in store
openOfferTarget.offerDescription1: Category Coupon. Limit one coupon/offer per guest. No other same department/category coupon will apply. Void if copied, scanned, altered, transferred, purchased, sold or prohibited by law. Item(s) may not be available at all stores.  Gift cards and tax will not be included in determining purchase total. Free Target GiftCard not valid as payment on this purchase; terms and conditions apply. Quantities limited; no rain checks. Maximum retail value
openOfferTarget.offerDescription2: for free Target GiftCard. Coupon cannot be applied to previous purchases. No cash value. Excludes items sold & shipped by Target Plus™ Partners.
